message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price of $1,100,000. I am willing to pay up to $950,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budgetary constraints, however, the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down to $1,025,000. I believe this is a fair compromise that reflects the immense value this product brings.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering your latest offer, I am still committed to finding a price that works within my budget. I am now able to offer $1,000,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
